headline: Does Record FFO, Higher Dividend, and New Guidance Change The Bull Case For Simon Property Group (SPG)?
summary: Simon Property Group reported record 2025 real estate funds from operations, strong leasing across over 17 million square feet, completed 23 redevelopment projects, and its Board declared a first-quarter 2026 common dividend of US$2.20 per share alongside the scheduled March 2026 payments on its Series J preferred stock. Management also issued 2026 net income guidance of US$6.87 to US$7.12 per diluted share, underlining how recent acquisitions and a more than US$4.00 billion development...

headline: Simon Property Q4 FFO Beats Estimates on Higher Revenues & Rent
summary: SPG's Q4 FFO tops estimates as revenues jumped, lease income climbed and base rents rose across U.S. malls and premium outlets.
